duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as key point of contact for all commercial finance topics in North America, Europe, and Asia.
Approve deal economics, support leadership approval reviews
Review contracts to identify and mitigate commercial finance risks
Assess customer creditworthiness and financing structures prior to bid submission
Drive accuracy forecasts for sales, margin, and cash from new orders.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in finance, accounting, or related field from an accredited college or university (Master's Degree preferred)
